named-query.name: SHIPPINGREGION_SELECT_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT sr FROM ShippingRegionImpl sr ORDER BY sr.name

named-query.name: SHIPPINGREGION_FIND_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM ShippingRegionImpl s WHERE s.name = ?1

named-query.name: SHIPPINGSERVICELEVEL_SELECT_BY_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT ssl FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ssl.shippingRegion LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ssl.shippingCostCalculationMethod WHERE ssl.store.code = ?1

named-query.name: SHIPPINGSERVICELEVEL_SELECT_BY_STORE_AND_STATE
named-query.query: SELECT ssl FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ssl.shippingRegion LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ssl.shippingCostCalculationMethod WHERE ssl.store.code = ?1 AND ssl.enabled = ?2

named-query.name: SHIPPINGSERVICELEVEL_UIDS_SELECT_BY_STORE_AND_STATE
named-query.query: SELECT ssl.uidPk FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ssl.shippingRegion LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ssl.shippingCostCalculationMethod WHERE ssl.store.code = ?1 AND ssl.enabled = ?2

named-query.name: SHIPPINGREGION_UID_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT ssl.shippingRegion.uidPk FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ssl.shippingRegion GROUP BY ssl.shippingRegion.uidPk

named-query.name: SHIPPINGREGION_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT ssl.shippingRegion FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl LEFT OUTER JOIN FETCH ssl.shippingRegion

named-query.name: SHIPPINGSERVICELEVEL_UID_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT ph.shippingServiceLevelInternal.uidPk FROM PhysicalOrderShipmentImpl ph

named-query.name: SHIPPINGSERVICELEVEL_CODE_BY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT ssl.code FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl WHERE ssl.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: SHIPPINGSERVICELEVEL_FIND_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT ssl FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl WHERE ssl.code = ?1

named-query.name: SHIPPINGSERVICELEVEL_FIND_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT ssl FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl WHERE ssl.guid = ?1

named-query.name: SHIPPINGSERVICELEVEL_CODE_EXIST
named-query.query: SELECT ssl.code FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl WHERE ssl.code = ?1

named-query.name: SHIPPINGSERVICELEVEL_UIDS_SELECT_BY_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT ssl.uidPk FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl WHERE ssl.lastModifiedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: SHIPPINGSERVICELEVELS_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT ssl FROM ShippingServiceLevelImpl ssl WHERE ssl.uidPk in (:list)
